content: Select three websites to research a topic related to the impact of climate change on the global economy, and provide a comparative analysis of the information gathered. The analysis should include statistical data, graphs, and charts, and should be presented in a report format using LaTeX. Additionally, one of the websites selected should be in a language other than English, and the analysis must include a comparison of the information obtained from that website with the other two English-language websites. Finally, the report should also include a section on the credibility of the sources used and the methodology employed in the research process.
